channel.title: W3C Timed Text Working Group-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Timed Text Working Group

item.title: [webvtt1] ::cue - Try it - Need for explanation
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::cue

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::cue#try_it

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

Hello,

I've copied the "Try it" example to my laptop.
The HTML, CSS, mp4 and vtt files are in the same directory.

When I run the HTML file, I get this error message (see attachment).
What could be the explanation?

Thanks for your feedback.

What did you expect to see?

Be able to view subtitles

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

No response

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response

item.title: [webvtt1] ::cue should include ::cue() information
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::cue

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

No response

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

The ::cue selector also has a ::cue() pseudo-element version which accepts a selector. This is not reflected in any examples or explanations on the page.

What did you expect to see?

an example, such as ::cue([srclang|="en"]) explained

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

No response

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response

MDN metadata

Page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/css/_doublecolon_cue
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::cue
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/files/en-us/web/css/_doublecolon_cue/index.md
  • Last commit: 1a7ab87
  • Document last modified: 2022-09-27T04:25:08.000Z
